name: Ludum Dare #34
description:
My first project and entry for Ludum Dare. The themes are "Grow" and "Two Button Control", which, were challenging. I actually didn't have the idea until late Saturday night, and only had 24 hours remaining.

Not the best, and certainly not my last. I'm just happy to have finished something. As per the compo rules, the project file is included. It's made with Construct 2.
